testcase.name: Verify that the HomePage is launched successfully
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the configured browser.................................passed When the user navigate to the configured application URL....................passed Then the homepage should be displayed.......................................passed And the page title should be verified.......................................passed

testcase.name: Click Buy and navigate to Villas in Bangalore
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the MagicBricks homepage......................................passed When I click on the Buy module..............................................passed And I click on Villa in Bangalore...........................................passed Then I should be redirected to the Villas in Bangalore listings page........passed

testcase.name: User cityPage - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cityPage...................................................passed And user enters city name from sheet 0 and row 0............................passed When user clicks on search button...........................................passed Then it should display list of properties available.........................passed

testcase.name: User cityPage - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on cityPage...................................................passed And user enters city name from sheet 0 and row 1............................passed When user clicks on search button...........................................passed Then it should display list of properties available.........................passed

testcase.name: User navigates to Ready-to-Move flats and clicks Post Property
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the homepage..........................................passed When the user clicks on the Buy option......................................passed And the user clicks on the Ready to Move....................................passed Then the user should be navigated to Ready to move flats page...............passed And the user clicks on zero brokerage using.................................passed Then the Post Property page should be displayed successfully................passed

testcase.name: User navigates to the Rates and Trends - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the MagicBricks Home Page..................................passed And the user clicks on the Rates and Trend..................................passed And user enters project name from sheet 1 and row 0.........................passed When user clicks on show Trends.............................................passed Then it should display the updated properties...............................passed

testcase.name: User navigates to the Rates and Trends - #1.2
